title: lethargic seal
author: lethargic seal
content: i tryed to install electrum 4.4.3 on fedora 36; could not get it to install, i think maybe i dont have the right cammands. is electrum 4.4.3 too modern for fedora 36? is this a question better asked on the fedora forms?

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Did you try to just use the AppImage? It may run and would save you a lot of time and hassle.Just make sure you get it from the official website and check the signature.

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: By using AppImage you will avoid many dependencies problems.just download the .appimage from https://electrum.org/#download and verify signature. Move AppImages into a standard locationFrom terminal, locate to that file run chmod a+x <electrum_AppImage>Or click onÂ  "properties" then click on "Permissions" tab then "Allow executing file as program."You can read more here https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/AppImage
